title: Design Director
content:
Design Director
We're looking for a Design Director to join our US-based creative team. They will assist in managing a team of various designers for one of our large clients. The right candidate has a background in concepting big ideas with other creatives, knows how to design for both digital and print, has experience presenting work to clients, has acute attention to detail, and is passionate about innovative design. Strong communication skills are required. 
The ideal candidate is a go-getter who jumps on new opportunities, designs with pixel-perfect precision, and can provide creative direction to other art directors and designers. This is a fast-paced work environment, so attentiveness and the ability to handle multiple projects with ease are a must. You’re able to stay humble while showing off your creative thinking, and will help us maintain an environment that encourages expression, inclusivity, and collaboration. 
Responsibilities
Creative Direction

Help steer creative campaigns and manage multiple projects for one of our large global clients.
Combine strong creative art direction skills with critical thinking; your analytical approach enables you to ask the right questions and provide ideas from both a strategic and conceptual perspective.
As part of a dedicated team within MediaMonks, you’ll lead the creative process taking on digitally focused promotions — big and small. Concept to execution, for digital ads, social media, presentations, and out-of-home.
Identify and develop the right set of assets and corresponding content to build stronger relationships between clients and their key partners.
Go above and beyond the original brief to push what’s possible even under tight deadlines.

Leadership & Management

Be client facing and co-owning client relationships; You’ll build and maintain key relationships with all clients and key stakeholders.
Provide leadership and mentoring to art directors and designers on the team
Manage multiple work streams while ensuring all deliverables are at a world-class level.
Build and maintain key relationships with internal cross-functional teams, including Creative, Producers, and Account Leadership.
Serve as quality control in reviewing assets and deliverables against the original client goals, you help to make sure all work is conceptually in line with campaign objectives and client expectations.
Develop a holistic understanding of our client’s overall brand and craft flexible concepts that can be applied to a variety of executions.

Requirements

An online portfolio showing both concept and design-driven digital work
For this lead position, we’re looking for a management level individual with strong experience in art direction and design
A track record of leading creative teams in an advertising or production agency (Minimum 5 years of leadership)
Advanced English proficiency
Exemplary communication skills
Work hours would be adjusted closer to PST work hours
Guide and mentor several teams at the same time including other art directors and designers.
Mastery of digital design tools (Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch) for diverse formats (web, social, video, email, etc.)
Expert understanding of typography, illustration, and layout; making things look beautiful is second-nature.
You’re able to present a portfolio of praise-worthy projects, showcasing your understanding of cultural trends and innovative technologies. 
You can successfully ideate and pitch your ideas in a digestible, understandable format.
Ability to develop strategically-sound concepts and create activations that are both achievable and attention-worthy
Experience working within and creating design systems and templates
Experience collaborating across Google Apps (ie. Slides, Docs, Sheets, Gmail)
Experience storyboarding video and working with a motion graphics team
Rigorous attention to detail
Familiarity of music industry, content creation, and social media trends is a plus

#LI-FC1 #LI-MP1 #LI-HybridAbout Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.
